default.title: Unexpected Error
default.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Please reload the page.

notFound.description: The requested page does not exist

axiosError.title: Server Error
axiosError.description: There was an error while handling the request. Please reload the page.
axiosError.correlationIdText: You will find the error id below, copy and paste it into the reporting form on the Support page.

forbidden.title: Not authorized
forbidden.description: You don't have the necessary permissions to view the page.

tokenExchange.title: Authentication error
tokenExchange.description: Please, go back to Area Riservata and try again

assistencePartySelection.title: Error: not authorized.
assistencePartySelection.description: You do not have the necessary permissions to view PDND Interoperability in support mode, or your session has expired. Try signing in again from Google Workspace.
